result.title: Q-Tales Ontology (OWL/RDF)
result.description: Q-Tales specific ontology will be a combination of existing ontologies with the addition of new custom classes (mental state, learning difficulties, cultural differences, physical disabilities, ethics, etc) that will be created to serve the needs of the collaboration platform and the search needs of the end users for the identification of the most adequate apps for their needs.

result.title: Q-Tales example scenarios
result.description: 5 indicative scenarios will be prepared that will embrace the vision of Q-Tales. The scenarios will be based on existing printed books or brand new stories and will integrate the game mechanics envisaged and the pedagogical framework to help end users reach the training goals.
